meanings.sent1: The dry sponge was completely juiceless.
meanings.sent2: The desert plant looked juiceless under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent3: The juiceless fruit made for a disappointing snack.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded juiceless, lacking any emotion.
meanings.sent5: The juiceless soil cracked under the heat, desperate for water.

meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, he felt completely juiceless.
meanings.sent2: The tired puppy looked juiceless as it lay on the floor.
meanings.sent3: His juiceless attempt at dancing made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The party was lively, but she felt juiceless in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The juiceless performance lacked the usual spark and enthusiasm.
